title: UCT operations to return to normal on Tuesday Released: 22h45, 19 October 2015 (University of ...
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) Dear colleagues and students I am writing to inform you that university operations will proceed as normal tomorrow. Whilst we cannot predict all possible scenarios, we wish for the University of Cape Town
